title: HGB Roadtrip 2017 - Natchez
itunes:title: HGB Roadtrip 2017 - Natchez
description: Diane and Denise are on the road for the HGB Roadtrip 2017. So far, they have visited Pensacola, Florida with its haunted lighthouse and forts and Natchez, Mississippi, home of some of the most beautiful Antebellum mansions. Natchez was home to the second largest slave market at one time. This is a city of timeless charm and long legends. A ghost tour led them into two haunted locations and weird experiences happened at both. Join them as they share there experiences, recorded as they drive between locations! Keep it spooky Ya'all!!
